text: Hamon guna [ki qiʙlai sumo jak qiʙlai mijona ast] sumoro niz ummati mijona [va ahli e'tidol] qaror dodem to [dar ruzi qijomat] ʙar mardum guvoh ʙosed [ki pajomʙaroni ilohi pajomasonro ʙa durusti rasonidaand] va pajomʙar ʙar sumo guvoh ʙosad [ki kalomi Allohro ʙa sumo rasonidaast] va mo qiʙlaero, ki ʙestar ʙar on ʙudi [Bajt-ul-muqaddas], qaror nadodem, magar ʙaroi in ki kasero, ki az pajomʙar pajravi mekunad, az kase, ki ʙa aqiʙ ʙozmegardad [va az itoati Alloh taolo va rasulas rujgardon mesavad], ʙozsinosem. Musallaman in [hukm] cuz ʙar kasone, ki Alloh taolo hidojatason karda ʙosad, sanginu dusvor ast. Alloh taolo hargiz imon [va namoz]-i sumoro zoe' namegardonad. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo nisʙat ʙa mardum dilsuzu mehruʙon ast
